thread.title: Trail Blazers vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Live updates, score and game chat
thread.title_full: Trail Blazers vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Live updates, score and game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Joe Freeman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Trail Blazers vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Live updates, score and game chat
text:
The Portland Trail Blazers and Los Angeles Lakers have tipped off at the Staples Center in an exhibition matchup between Western Conference foes.
Damian Lillard and CJ McCollum , who combined to score 58 points and hand out 15 assists while playing more than 40 minutes each during a Sunday night victory over the Utah Jazz, are not expected to play regular minutes after the heavy load last night. Also, small forward Al-Farouq Aminu is expected to miss his second consecutive game with a strained left hamstring.
Follow along and offer your thoughts on the game in comments section below.
After tonight's game, visit OregonLive.com/blazers for a recap and more coverage.
â€” Joe Freeman | jfreeman@oregonian.com | 503-294-5183 | @BlazerFreeman
